graphql.query:
query task {
  task(code: "T00002") {
    id,
    code,
    title,
    description,
    loyaltyPoints,
    isTimeBound,
    isPeopleBound,
    isProductRelevant,
    finishDate,
    maximumPeople,
    skuID,
    subtasks {
        id,
        title,
        description
    }
    createdAt
  }
}
